Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the dormitory authority to provide financing to Mary Cariola Children's Center Inc.
Summary: Authorizes the dormitory authority to provide financing to the Mary Cariola Children's Center, Inc. located in Rochester, New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the dormitory authority to provide financing to Mary Cariola Children's Center, Inc.
